athlete.name: Michael Jordan
athlete.quote: I've missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. Twenty-six times I've been trusted to take the game-winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
athlete.significance: This quote highlights Jordan's resilience and the importance of perseverance and learning from failure in sports.

athlete.name: Pelé
athlete.quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice, and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
athlete.significance: Pelé emphasizes the dedication and passion required to succeed in sports and life.

athlete.name: Serena Williams
athlete.quote: I really think a champion is defined not by their wins but by how they can recover when they fall.
athlete.significance: Serena underscores the importance of resilience and the ability to overcome setbacks.

athlete.name: Muhammad Ali
athlete.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'
athlete.significance: Ali highlights the importance of hard work and perseverance to achieve greatness in sports.

athlete.name: Lionel Messi
athlete.quote: You have to fight to reach your dream. You have to sacrifice and work hard for it.
athlete.significance: Messi stresses the value of hard work and determination in achieving one's goals.

athlete.name: Wayne Gretzky
athlete.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
athlete.significance: Gretzky’s quote is about the importance of taking opportunities and not being afraid to try.

athlete.name: Usain Bolt
athlete.significance: Bolt’s philosophy on pushing beyond perceived boundaries and striving for greatness.

athlete.name: Roger Federer
athlete.quote: I fear no one, but respect everyone.
athlete.significance: Federer speaks to the importance of respecting opponents while maintaining confidence in one's abilities.

athlete.name: Rafael Nadal
athlete.quote: The glory is being happy. The glory is not winning here or winning there. The glory is enjoying practicing, enjoying every day, enjoying to work hard, trying to be a better player than before.
athlete.significance: Nadal emphasizes the joy and fulfillment that comes from the daily grind and continuous improvement.

athlete.name: Kobe Bryant
athlete.quote: The moment you give up, is the moment you let someone else win.
athlete.significance: Bryant’s quote is about the importance of perseverance and never giving up.

athlete.name: Simone Biles
athlete.quote: I’m not the next Usain Bolt or Michael Phelps. I’m the first Simone Biles.
athlete.significance: Biles highlights the importance of individuality and making one's own mark in sports.

athlete.name: Jackie Robinson
athlete.quote: A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.
athlete.significance: Robinson speaks to the broader impact athletes can have beyond the field, inspiring others through their actions.

athlete.name: Diego Maradona
athlete.quote: When people succeed, it is because of hard work. Luck has nothing to do with success.
athlete.significance: Maradona emphasizes the importance of effort and dedication in achieving success.

athlete.name: Billie Jean King
athlete.quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
athlete.significance: King highlights the determination and persistence needed to achieve excellence in sports.

athlete.name: Tom Brady
athlete.quote: You wanna know which ring is my favorite? The next one.
athlete.significance: Brady's relentless drive for success and continuous improvement in his sport.
